name: StoreLocator Metizsoft for wordpress
author: Metizsoft

sections.description:
Storelocator Metizsoft is used connect the shopify project

Features

Few features of this plugin:

  1. No SSL required
  2. No PCI required
  3. Easy to install and configure
  4. Option to configure success & failure message
sections.installation:
Easy steps to install the plugin:

  1. Upload storelocator_metizsoft folder/directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. On this page you will Connect your store
sections.faq:
Is SSL Required to use this plugin?

SSL is not required
